org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.serialization

类 SpanningRecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.serialization.SpanningRecordSerializer<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T -
    所有已实现的接口:
    RecordSerializer<T>

    public class SpanningRecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordSerializer<T>
    Record serializer which serializes the complete record to an intermediate data serialization buffer and copies this buffer to target buffers one-by-one using setNextBuffer(Buffer).

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.serialization.RecordSerializer

        RecordSerializer.SerializationResult

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private static boolean CHECKED
      Flag to enable/disable checks, if buffer not set/full or pending serialization
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer dataBuffer
      Intermediate buffer for data serialization (wrapped from serializationBuffer)
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer lengthBuffer
      Intermediate buffer for length serialization
      private int limit
      Limit of current MemorySegment of target buffer
      private int position
      Position in current MemorySegment of target buffer
      private DataOutputSerializer serializationBuffer
      Intermediate data serialization
      private Buffer targetBuffer
      Current target Buffer of the serializer

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      RecordSerializer.SerializationResult addRecord(T record)
      Serializes the complete record to an intermediate data serialization buffer and starts copying it to the target buffer (if available).
      void clear()
      Resets the target buffer to null and resets internal state set up for the record to serialize.
      void clearCurrentBuffer()
      Resets the target buffer to null.
      private void copyToTargetBufferFrom(java.nio.ByteBuffer source)
      Copies as many bytes as possible from the given ByteBuffer to the MemorySegment of the target Buffer and advances the current position by the number of written bytes.
      Buffer getCurrentBuffer()
      Retrieves the current target buffer and sets its size to the actual number of written bytes.
      private RecordSerializer.SerializationResult getSerializationResult() 
      boolean hasData()
      Determines whether data is left, either in the current target buffer or in any internal state set up for the record to serialize.
      void instantiateMetrics(TaskIOMetricGroup metrics)
      Instantiates all metrics.
      RecordSerializer.SerializationResult setNextBuffer(Buffer buffer)
      Sets a (next) target buffer to use and continues writing remaining data to it until it is full.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addRecord

        public RecordSerializer.SerializationResult addRecord(T record)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes the complete record to an intermediate data serialization buffer and starts copying it to the target buffer (if available).
        指定者:
        addRecord 在接口中 RecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>
        参数:
        record - the record to serialize
        返回:
        how much information was written to the target buffer and whether this buffer is full
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • setNextBuffer

        public RecordSerializer.SerializationResult setNextBuffer(Buffer buffer)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: RecordSerializer
        Sets a (next) target buffer to use and continues writing remaining data to it until it is full.
        指定者:
        setNextBuffer 在接口中 RecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>
        参数:
        buffer - the new target buffer to use
        返回:
        how much information was written to the target buffer and whether this buffer is full
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • copyToTargetBufferFrom

        private void copyToTargetBufferFrom(java.nio.ByteBuffer source)
        Copies as many bytes as possible from the given ByteBuffer to the MemorySegment of the target Buffer and advances the current position by the number of written bytes.
        参数:
        source - the ByteBuffer to copy data from

      • getSerializationResult

        private RecordSerializer.SerializationResult getSerializationResult()

      • getCurrentBuffer

        public Buffer getCurrentBuffer()
        从接口复制的说明: RecordSerializer
        Retrieves the current target buffer and sets its size to the actual number of written bytes. After calling this method, a new target buffer is required to continue writing (see RecordSerializer.setNextBuffer(Buffer)).
        指定者:
        getCurrentBuffer 在接口中 RecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>
        返回:
        the target buffer that was used

      • clearCurrentBuffer

        public void clearCurrentBuffer()
        从接口复制的说明: RecordSerializer
        Resets the target buffer to null.

        NOTE: After calling this method, a new target buffer is required to continue writing (see RecordSerializer.setNextBuffer(Buffer)).

        指定者:
        clearCurrentBuffer 在接口中 RecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>

      • clear

        public void clear()
        从接口复制的说明: RecordSerializer
        Resets the target buffer to null and resets internal state set up for the record to serialize.

        NOTE: After calling this method, a new record and a new target buffer is required to start writing again (see RecordSerializer.setNextBuffer(Buffer)). If you want to continue with the current record, use RecordSerializer.clearCurrentBuffer() instead.

        指定者:
        clear 在接口中 RecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>

      • hasData

        public boolean hasData()
        从接口复制的说明: RecordSerializer
        Determines whether data is left, either in the current target buffer or in any internal state set up for the record to serialize.
        指定者:
        hasData 在接口中 RecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>
        返回:
        true if some data is present

      • instantiateMetrics

        public void instantiateMetrics(TaskIOMetricGroup metrics)
        从接口复制的说明: RecordSerializer
        Instantiates all metrics.
        指定者:
        instantiateMetrics 在接口中 RecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>
        参数:
        metrics - metric group
